feed.title: InvenTree Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.16.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.16.x] UI link fix (#8508) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8509
  • [0.16.x] after_save_stock_item (#8546) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8548
  • [0.16.x] Bug fix: record shipment date (#8580) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8581
  • Import fix backport by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8597
  • Fix requirements.txt by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8598

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.8...0.16.9

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.0
entry.content:
0.17.0 Stable Release

We are very pleased to announce the 0.17.0 stable release of InvenTree! Read more about it on our blog.

What's Changed

Breaking Changes

  • Improve "issued by" filter for Build list API by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7900
  • [Breaking] Samesite Cookie Fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8269
  • Prevent multiple background workers without global cache by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8401
  • [Refactor] Remove 'test statistics' by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8487
  • Plugins installation improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8503
  • API date filter updates by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8544
  • Set null location on stock item: by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8565

Security Patches

  • Bump django from 4.2.14 to 4.2.15 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7827
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 7 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8056
  • Bump vite from 5.4.5 to 5.4.6 in /src/frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8138
  • Bump django from 4.2.15 to 4.2.16 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8257
  • [CUI] Fix rendering issues for barcodes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8286
  • Bump backend deps by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8290
  • [PUI] SSO improvments by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8527
  • Bump pyjwt from 2.10.0 to 2.10.1 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8619
  • Bump django from 4.2.16 to 4.2.17 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8634
  • Fix vulnerable dependencies by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8655

Database Changes

  • [WIP] Testable parts by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7888
  • Test template fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8031
  • [Bug] Ensure links are prepended with base URL on receipt by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8367
  • Purchase Order Destination by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8403
  • Sales order improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8445
  • Remove dummy migration file by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8537
  • SalesOrder Data Migration by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8585

New Features

  • Adds "ON HOLD" status to order models by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7807
  • [PUI] Edit shortcut by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7870
  • Update default fonts for docker image by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7881
  • Build table fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7940
  • Enhance plugin SN validation by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7942
  • [Build] Create child builds by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7941
  • User defined states by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7862
  • [PUI] Add Link/Unlink Barcode action by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7939
  • [PUI] Add pagination controls by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7958
  • [PUI] Add view of all defined units to Admin center by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8040
  • PUI Plugin Panels by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7470
  • Duplicate orders via API by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8145
  • Barcode logging by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8150
  • [PUI] Plugin panel context by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8190
  • Shipment Reports by @fuzeman in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8194
  • New event triggers by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8226
  • Shipment Attachments by @fuzeman in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8231
  • [PUI] Plugin settings UI by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8228
  • [Refactor] Sales Order Shipment by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8249
  • [PUI] Sales order shipments by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8250
  • [PUI] Table query params by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8279
  • Order table variants by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8295
  • [Plugin] Enhancements for serial number validation by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8311
  • Log failed task by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8333
  • [PUI] stock table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8396
  • [PUI] Dashboard refactor by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8278
  • Offload initial email task by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8413
  • Enable ordering of BomList by 'reference' by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8437
  • Invoke error handling by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8454
  • [PUI] Part allocations by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8458
  • Add level indicators and path to stock location and part category dropdowns by @chris-thorn in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8366
  • configurable ldap group classes by @jacobfelknor in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8475
  • [PUI] Use ApiIcon for plugin panels by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8496
  • Add structlog by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7937
  • Add PO wildcard default setting by @jacobfelknor in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8532
  • Add new report filters for accessing database tables by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8560
  • Add SelectionList concept by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8054
  • Set status when returning from customer by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8571
  • Stock Transfer Improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8570
  • [PUI] Hide "location" column in certain conditions by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8587
  • Return Order - Improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8590
  • Allow settings value to be nullified by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8596
  • [PUI] Supplier part badges by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8625
  • [PUI] Order Parts Wizard by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8602
  • [Refactor] Barcode scanning by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8658

Bug Fixes

  • Metadata api fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7829
  • [Bug] Attachment permissions by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7863
  • Panel tab click fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7867
  • Fix usePartFields hook by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7868
  • [Bug] Check before calling schedule_pricing_update by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7871
  • Update Chinese language support by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7878
  • [PUI] Fix settings indentation by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7905
  • [PUI] Fix user detail save on PUI by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7906
  • [PUI] Fix broken SKU link by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7909
  • [PUI] Fix for BOM pricing donut chart by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7917
  • [PUI] Order Currency by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7918
  • [PUI] Check length before access by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7923
  • Fix columns for build line table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7931
  • Bug fix for PurchaseOrderCancelSerializer by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7943
  • [PUI] fix missing key in currency table by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7953
  • [PUI] Test result fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7956
  • [BUG] Order of states in schema descriptions is not stable by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7978
  • Fix state changes on stock items by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7976
  • Fix path by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7979
  • Add git config for CI by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7983
  • fix translatable string by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7999
  • Add extra undefined check for table filters by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8008
  • Fix "sales_order" filter for build table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8024
  • Fix return type of detail queries by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8038
  • Surpress error if no changes exsist by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8043
  • Fix for image click events by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8071
  • Fix for part serializer by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8069
  • PUI: Improve table rendering of link columns by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8072
  • [PUI] Fix translation of model type strings by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8093
  • Improve logic for automatically updating part pricing by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8090
  • Fix image upload for company page by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8120
  • Ensure DBBACKUP_STORAGE_OPTIONS is a dict by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8153
  • [PUI] Fix BOM table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8162
  • [PUI] Part charts fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8171
  • [PUI] Importer fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8186
  • [PUI] Fix for plugin table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8189
  • [PUI] Fix Build Output Forms by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8184
  • [PUI] Form error fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8204
  • Exception handling for BulkDeleteMixin by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8205
  • Add exception handling for default template creatoin by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8209
  • Path management improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8210
  • Fix build item over-allocation checks by @fuzeman in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8235
  • Unit Test Fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8245
  • fix part qr lable by @skydiablo in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8255
  • [Bug] Samesite cookie fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8262
  • Fix bug in merge_stock_items by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8284
  • Clear allocations when manually returning an item into stock by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8298
  • Bug fix: Manually create serialized stock by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8306
  • [CUI] Shipment fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8309
  • Fix for add_tracking_entry in build.create_output by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8310
  • Fix breadcrumb for by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8305
  • Markdown link fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8328
  • CUI: Fix for part pricing panel by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8338
  • Add "active" field to SupplierPart form by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8341
  • Fix display of purchase order lines by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8339
  • use LABEL_DEFAULT_PRINTER user setting to pre-select plugin in label printing forms by @simonkuehling in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8330
  • PUI: Show "Return from customer" option by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8345
  • Bug fix for auto-allocation against build order by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8359
  • [WIP] Build line filter fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8343
  • Notifications fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8360
  • [Bug] Fix issue with build order lines table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8376
  • [Bug] Fix for create_child_builds by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8399
  • Bug fix for plugin table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8411
  • [Bug] Build Output Create by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8417
  • Fix for potential MissingKey error by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8422
  • Importer permissions by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8419
  • PO receive fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8423
  • Improve optional chaining checks by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8431
  • [PUI] Notification fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8435
  • fix: Narrow scope of cleanup by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8441
  • [PUI] Fix for stock item edit by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8451
  • Fix for useReturnOrderLineItemFields by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8462
  • Improve null checks for SalesOrder.shipment by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8469
  • Fix for locate item plugins by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8473
  • Fix for "installed in" display by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8480
  • UI link fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8508
  • github/workflows: fix missing dotfiles in frontend-build.zip by @Mixaill in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8516
  • fix refreshInstance type and remove return by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8478
  • after_save_stock_item by @skydiablo in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8546
  • Add location when creating multiple serials by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8564
  • Handle pre-rendering when classic frontend is disabled by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8563
  • [PUI] Fix stock actions by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8569
  • Bug fix: record shipment date by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8580
  • [PUI] Fix stock item state rendering by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8572
  • Fix for hasOwn by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8600
  • [PUI] fix infinite loop if classic frontend is disabled by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8614
  • [PUI] fix Table Context Menu Links by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8623
  • Fix ordering issue in notifications table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8626
  • Bug fix for stock transfer by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8631
  • Fix URL generation error by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8630
  • fix namespace of frontend install command by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8662

Devops / Setup Changes

  • Add more liniting rules (mostly for imports) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7846
  • Adjust docker labels to modern OCI schema by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7773
  • [CI] Switch to using Crowdin GitHub Action by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7929
  • Chore: Bump python requirements by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7961
  • chore: pin 2 missing actions by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8006
  • Change target branch for translation by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8015
  • Fix package upgrade process by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8034
  • Add more test coverage for backend by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8048
  • Add namespaces to tasks by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7904
  • Packager: easier to parse debug messages by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8083
  • Package use uv by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8082
  • [PUI] Add codecov bundler analyzer by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8097
  • Revert int.worker to worker by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8126
  • A bit more testing by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8053
  • [API] Sales order filters by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8331
  • Adjustments to default template file by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8440
  • [PUI] Switch linting to biome by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8317
  • Additional output for invoke tasks by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8476
  • Enable redis by default for docker setup by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8501
  • Update tasks.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8522
  • Additional playwright tests by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8549
  • Add unit test by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8550

Dependencies

  • Bump mkdocs-material from 9.5.30 to 9.5.31 in /docs in the dependencies group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7813
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 5 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7811
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 41 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7812
  • Bump the dependencies group across 2 directories with 25 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7859
  • Bump the dependencies group with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7860
  • Bump axios from 1.7.3 to 1.7.4 in /src/frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7901
  • Bump the dependencies group across 2 directories with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7861
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 9 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7927
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7926
  • Bump the dependencies group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7925
  • Bump djangorestframework from 3.14.0 to 3.15.2 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7520
  • Bump the dependencies group across 2 directories with 15 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8001
  • Bump github/codeql-action from 3.26.3 to 3.26.5 in the dependencies group by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8000
  • Bump mkdocs-material from 9.5.32 to 9.5.33 in /docs in the dependencies group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8002
  • Update pint library to latest version by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8028
  • Bump frontend deps by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8047
  • Bump the dependencies group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8057
  • Bump the dependencies group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8058
  • Bump cryptography from 43.0.0 to 43.0.1 in /src/backend by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8064
  • Bump the dependencies group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8099

Other Changes

  • Update version to 0.17.0 dev by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7820
  • [PUI] Make filter choice drop-down searchable by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7830

  • [PUI] Build output table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7898
  • [PUI] Report print timeout by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7899
  • [PUI] Extra line table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7889
  • [PUI] Add theme changer to navbar by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7907
  • [PUI] Add AdminCenter to cmd k by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7908
  • Cleanup notification drawer by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7911
  • Add "description" column to by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7912

  • [PUI] Sub builds table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7932

  • Table borders by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7957
  • Revert status fields for stock items by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7965
  • [PUI] Add currency stats by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7971
  • [PUI] Build actions by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7945
  • Forms refactor by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7981
  • Hide "build orders" tab for inactive parts by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7992
  • Reset page offset when changing page size by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7994
  • Enable more Ruff rules by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7930
  • Allow edit of build allocations from part context by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8007
  • [PUI] Add image based QR code assigment by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7960

  • Update for report / label template tables by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8019

  • Adjust "render_currency" behaviour by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8017
  • Allow notifications to be opened in new tab or window by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8030
  • [PUI] Test result table improvements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8032
  • Adds exchange backend settings to AdminCenter by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8042
  • [PUI] Make actions recognisable by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8005
  • Notes editor by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/7980
  • Handle null or undefined TextField values by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8066

  • Fix docstring for uploaded_image by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8077

  • Remove references to old setting by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8018
  • Update LICENSE by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8089
  • [PUI] Refactor keeping modelinfo together by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8104

  • [PUI] Installed items by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8202
  • [PUI] Adjust stock details page by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8196
  • Plugin helper function by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8220

  • Simplify display of "locked" part status by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8297

  • Improve API query by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8302
  • Refactoring / Enhancements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8307
  • [PUI] Tweaks for part purchase order table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8319
  • [PUI] Platform fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8324
  • Hide "allocations" tab for items which are not in stock by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8334

  • Task group by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8332
  • Settings validation enhancements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8351
  • [PUI] Machines table refactor by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8352
  • [PUI] Task table enhancements by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8369
  • [PUI] Add "received" filter to PurchaseOrderLineTable by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8377
  • [PUI] Search tweak by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8381
  • [PUI] Build allocation sub tables by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8380
  • [PUI] notifications fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8392
  • [PUI] Image tweak by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8398
  • [PUI] Table refactor by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8395
  • Re-render panels when context changes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8407
  • More error logging during plugin loads by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8408
  • Remove unnecessary code by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8418
  • Ignore MissingRate errors by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8420
  • fix link to MIT license by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8386
  • Enable printing actions for PartTable by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8430
  • Build hide incomplete by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8433
  • [PUI] Updates for AdminButton by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8434
  • Cleanup modals by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8432
  • Remove coupling of tests to cui by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8389
  • UI consolidation by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8450
  • Remove unneeded AjaxView usage by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8461
  • Catch invalid decimal conversion by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8470
  • CUI: Fix for navbar logo by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8472
  • [PUI] Page titles by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8467
  • Remove duplicate "locked" badge by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8477
  • fix various sonarlint warnings by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8479
  • Add row context (right click) additionally to actions in tables by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8013
  • [Plugins] Pass queryClient through to plugin by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8486
  • Small tweak to plugin staticfile collection output by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8498
  • Add empty context menu by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8519
  • Relation update by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8524
  • Improve plugin panels by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8523
  • Cleanup format_number by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8529
  • Better handling for undefined values in SettingsList by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8531
  • Fix spelling of InvenTree in code base by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8561
  • Small SAST fixes by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8534
  • Consumed filter by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8574
  • Add "stock" table to "category" page by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8579
  • Add extra section to release notes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8586
  • [PUI] Barcode title by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8591
  • [PUI] Make dashboard header look less like a widget by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8611
  • refactor Make logic simpler by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8613
  • Build required widget by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8610
  • [PUI] Url fixes by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8615
  • Add IPN column to RelatedPartTable by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8650
  • Add ITEM_RECEIVED event by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8651
  • Filter fix by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8652
  • Update release.yml by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8653
  • Refactor: Move settings definitions (and most validators) out of models.py by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8646
  • small readme refactor by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8663
  • Add a more complex example the the plugin unit test docs. by @SergeoLacruz in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8664
  • PUI: Adjust test result table by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8667
  • Update version number by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8676

New Contributors

  • @timmyhadwen made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8129
  • @fuzeman made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8194
  • @skydiablo made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8255
  • @webtroter made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8292
  • @chris-thorn made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8366
  • @jacobfelknor made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8475
  • @Mixaill made their first contribution in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.16.0...0.17.0

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Fix for table update (#8698) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8699
  • [0.17.x] Cast barcode scan IDs to list (#8701) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8702
  • [0.17.x] Image upload error (#8700) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8704
  • [0.17.x] [UI] Enhanced null checks (#8706) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8711
  • [Backport] Fix MFA auth flow by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8724
  • [0.17.x] Badge fix (#8725) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8727
  • [0.17.x] [UI] Link fix (#8726) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8728
  • [0.17.x] Forms fixes (#8722) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8729
  • [0.17.x] Add separate dialog for 'Ship Order' button (#8734) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8735
  • [0.17.x] Handle error when loading icon pack (#8753) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8755
  • [0.17.x] Fix default value for SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE (#8767) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8769

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8689
  • [0.17.x] Fix REST registration endpoint (#8738) by @matmair in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8763
  • [0.17.x] Zero stock fix (#8766) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8768

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.0...0.17.1

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Allow barcode linking for stock location (#8802) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8810
  • [0.17.x] Fix package install in envs using python lower than 3.12 on debian like OSs (#8793) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8813
  • [0.17.x] Fix for buggy Caddyfile (#8830) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8832
  • [0.17.x] Navigate to index when deleting a company (#8831) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8833
  • [0.17.x] Fix for test results in stock item report context (#8843) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8844
  • [0.17.x] Order creation fix (#8846) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8847
  • [0.17.x] Ensure error is raised (#8849) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8850
  • Extended error handling for get_user_color_theme by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8854

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8776

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.1...0.17.2

entry.title: New release for InvenTree: 0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Database Changes

  • [0.17.x] SalesOrder migration unit test (#8814) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8961

Bug Fixes

  • [0.17.x] Add Serbian to LanguageContext.tsx (#8880) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8881
  • [0.17.x] Upload timeout (#8895) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8899
  • [0.17.x] fix(plugin): Ensure plugins are only installed if not deactivated (#8893) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8901
  • [0.17.x] Allow CORS for /plugin/ URLs (#8898) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8900
  • [0.17.x] Import fix (#8924) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8926
  • [0.17.x] Plugin reload fix (#8922) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8936

Other Changes

  • Update version.py by @SchrodingersGat in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8859
  • [0.17.x] Include location detail in build output table (#8923) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8927
  • [0.17.x] Add check for minimum invoke version (#8952) by @github-actions in https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/pull/8954

Full Changelog: https://github.com/inventree/InvenTree/compare/0.17.2...0.17.3
